alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 7:03AM MST until December 14 at 10:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility down to a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Southwest Desert/Mimbres Basin, Northern Dona Ana County and Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
